Sections.Content:
For more information on this tour contact your Group Organiser

Robin Linnecar

Tel: 020 8942 1558

Email: linnecar@btinternet.com

.................................................................... Tailored Travel’s ATOL

81 Alric Avenue, New Malden KT3 4JP

Sections.Heading: Features
Sections.Content:
- 4* central Liverpool hotel
- Three dinners included
- All excursion travel & guided tours included
- Entrance fees to non-National Trust properties included
- Included River Mersey cruise on Day 3
- Blue Badge guide on Days 2 to 4
- Executive coach throughout

Sections.Heading: What We Will See
Sections.Content:
- Little Moreton Hall
- Liverpool – guided tour
- Metropolitan Roman Catholic Cathedral
- Liverpool Cathedral
- Walker Art Gallery – guided tour
- Antony Gormley’s ‘Another Place’ at Crosby Beach
- Museum of Liverpool
- Cruise on the River Mersey
- Albert Dock
- Liverpool
- Princes Road Synagogue – guided tour
- Speke Hall
- Tate Liverpool at Riba North, Mann Island
- Quarry Bank Mill & Styal Estate

Sections.Heading: Accommodation
Sections.Content: We stay four nights at the centrally located 4* Marriott Hotel (www.marriott.com) at Liverpool. Overlooking Queen Square, facilities at the hotel include a restaurant, bar, and a gymnasium. All rooms are en suite and feature television, telephone, hairdryer, an in-room safe, and tea & coffee making facilities. A set 3 course dinner will be served on the first evening, and a choice 3 course dinner will be served on Days 2 and 4. Day 3 is on a bed and breakfast basis.

Sections.Heading: Extras To Your Tour
Sections.Content:
- Insurance (including Covid cover) £38
- Single room supplement £119
- Entrance fees to National Trust properties
- (free to NT members)
- Gratuities
- Lunches
- Dinner on Day 3
- Price based on twin share. Minimum numbers
- required. Normal booking conditions apply.
